channel.title: Running Qubes and linux on the same laptop
channel.description: Hi, I would like to run both Qubes and regular linux on the same Laptop. Can you tell me how to split the hard drive in order to do that? I had windows installed and tried to put qubes where D: is but in the qubes instalator it showed the whole disk and not the 2 separate partitions.

item.title: Running Qubes and linux on the same laptop
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi justqurious

Qubes OS

Multibooting

Multibooting Qubes Introduction You should think carefully before dual booting Qubes on your box. Read the guidelines carefully. One problem is that when you dual or multiboot, even if you are using encryption on your Qubes installation, /boot is...

Read full topic
item.source: Running Qubes and linux on the same laptop
